tiled.plugins.tmw
Class TMWServerMapWriter

java.lang.Object
  tiled.plugins.tmw.TMWServerMapWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.FileFilter, MapWriter, PluggableMapIO
public class TMWServerMapWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapWriter

An exporter for TMW server map files, used to determine where a character can walk. The format is very simple: 

  short (width)
  short (height)
  char[] (data)

Version:
$Id$
